Export.Routine:
INWEINVDIF ;############################################################################### ; ; THIS ROUTINE HAS BEEN SUPERSEDED BY THE ROUTINE INStocktakeReport2 ; WHICH IS BASED ON STOCK BUNDLES. ; ;############################################################################### #include COMSYS #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Wrapper for older access through routine name ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do Report() quit Report() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; INVENTURDIFFERENZEN ; ; Called By: ; Button "D" - Stocktake Difference Report on form INWEINVD via GoTo^INWEINVD ; ; ByRef : ; VORG array from form INWEINVD ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Specific tag to meet coding standards. ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: $$CorrectByHistory^INWEINRUECK was being based ; on comma-delimited location list - corrected pending ; replacement (Comment here rather than code changes). ; 02-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Added sorting, bin limiters... ; 07.01.2002 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new GESAMT,UES,LFN,LFN1,ABSCHL,EK,EKDIF,SUM,ART,ART1,BET,WG,ME,LAP new blnPosted,blnItemSort set YKOPF = $$$Text("IN00461") ; Stocktake Difference Report //SR14508 set VORG(1)=$GET(VORG(1)) ; Stocktake Number set VORG(3)=$TRANSLATE($get(VORG(3)),",",";") ; Group Filter List ; FIXME : ";" *IS* the @netManager delimiter for set VORG(2)=$TRANSLATE($get(VORG(2)),",",";") ; Locn Filter List ; multi-select so these lines should not be necessary set VORG(10)=$GET(VORG(10)) ; VORGABE PREISBASIS ; FIXME : Not on form INWEINVD? used VORG(13) on INWEINVDS (Reason Code) //SR14508 set blnPosted = ''$get(VORG(11)) ; Include Posted Lines set VORG(7) = $get(VORG(7)) ; From Storage set VORG(8) = $get(VORG(8)) ; To Storage set blnItemSort = ''$get(VORG(12)) ; Sort by Item Number IF VORG(1)="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(47)) QUIT ; BITTE FPRÜFEN AUSWAHL ;please Selection IF VORG(10)="" SET VORG(10)=1 ; KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;LÖSCHEN ZWISCHENDATEI ;Delete ;BEARBEITEN ÜBERSCHRIFT ;superscription SET UES(1)=$$$StrINWEINVStocktakingCountingNumber_Y_$$$StrINWEINVStockLocation_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32024)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32026)_Y_$$$StrINWEINVActualQuantity_Y_"Adjusted Count Qty"_Y_$$^WWWTEXT("IN00449")_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32259)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32030)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32259)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32325) ;UEBERSCHRIFT ; ZÄHLNUMER LAGERPL ARTIKEL BEZEICHN IST SOLL DIFERENZMENGE ME DIFF BETRAG ;item if blnPosted set UES(1)=UES(1)_Y_$$$StrINWEINVPosted ;Posted DO SORT(blnPosted,blnItemSort) ;VORAUSWAHL DO ^WWWBACK DO DRUCK ;WERTE DRUCKEN ;print DO GESAMT ;SUMMENZEILE DO STOP^WWWTAB ;ENDE TABELLE ;termination tabulation //if $data(^WWWSOR(YUSER)) do MATERIAL //SR14508 - quit always for now KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;LÖSCHEN ZWISCHENDATEI ;Delete QUIT MATERIAL new MAT,MAT1,ME ;MATERIALZUSAMMENSTELLUNG WRITE YCR WRITE "" WRITE "" write "" write "" write "" write "" write "" SET MAT="" FOR SET MAT=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,MAT)) QUIT:MAT="" DO . SET MAT1=$PIECE($GET(^INMATERIAL(YM,MAT,1)),Y,1) . SET ME="" . FOR SET ME=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,MAT,ME)) QUIT:ME="" DO . . WRITE YCR . . ; . . WRITE "" . . write "" . . write "" . . write "" . . write "" . . write "" quit SORT(pblnPosted,pblnItemSort) ;------------------------------------------------------------------\ ; Inputs : ; pblnPosted : Show posted entries ; pblnItemSort: Are we sorting? ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 10-Dec-2007 GRF BR014557: Corrected tag name - updated in INStocktaking ; but not here ; 14-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014793: Do the difference compared to the currently selected count ; 17-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Macro Usage. and pass parameters ; 28-Feb-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Added Item Sort Method ;------------------------------------------------------------------/ new LFN,LFN1,idItem,idLoc kill ^CacheTempStkDiff(YUSER) set LFN = "" for { set LFN = $order(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN)) quit:LFN="" set LFN1 = $get(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN,1)) continue:+$$$INWEINVCountQuantity($$GetCount^INStocktaking(VORG(1),LFN,VORG(15)))=+$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1) continue:'pblnPosted&&($$$INWEINVPosted(LFN1)'="") ; Already Posted continue:$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)="" ; Not Counted continue:$$$INWEINVItemNumber(LFN1)="" if pblnItemSort { set ^CacheTempStkDiff(YUSER,$$$INWEINVItemNumber(LFN1),$$$INWEINVLocation(LFN1),LFN) = "" } else { set ^CacheTempStkDiff(YUSER,LFN) = "" } } QUIT DRUCK ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display ; ; History: ; 17-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Macro Usage and get the stocktake details ; 02-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Added sort order, post date, limiters ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strGlobal,query new SUM,objStocktake,tmsInvCreated,LFN SET SUM=0 set fltTotalInc=0 set fltTotalDec=0 ;SUMME ;sum //DO ^INLISTKOPF ;DRUCKEN DECKBLATT ;print DO Print^WWWLISTKOPF("9;13;14") //SR14508 DO UPUEB ;DRUCKEN ÜBERSCHRIFT ;print superscription SET YDDSATZ=0 ;AUSWERTUNG DRUCKEN ;print // SR14857: Get the stocktake details and pass them through. set objStocktake = $get(^INWEINVP(YM,VORG(1),1)) set tmsInvCreated = $$$INWEINVPSystemDate(objStocktake) set strGlobal = "^CacheTempStkDiff("""_YUSER_""")" $$$Query(strGlobal,query) set LFN = $qsubscript(query,$qlength(query)) do DRUCKLINE(LFN,tmsInvCreated) $$$End quit DRUCKLINE(LFN,ptmsCreated) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display a line ; ; Params: LFN - INWEINV line number ; ptmsCreated - When the stocktake count was created. ; ; History: ; 02-Dec-2010 shobby SR17599: Redirected CorrectByHistory ; 17-Sep-2008 GRF Restore missing ". ;" lines - okay operationally since ; we close up the gaps in the .INT file but potentially ; dangerous if someone adds a comment line or something ; without the correct number of dots. ; 17-Dec-2007 PJones BR014799 : We need to make sure we're getting the ; up-to-date count ; 10-Dec-2007 GRF BR014557: Corrected tag name - updated in INStocktaking ; but not here; UNDEFINED error on idStocktake - changed ; to VORG(1) ; 14-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014793: Do the difference compared to the currently ; selected count ; 27-Nov-2006 JW BR014285: Item group change ; 29-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: render the item group under the item number ; 19-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Pass through the stock locations to the ; correction routines. ; 17-Aug-2006 RPW SR14857: Macro usage and variables added to speed things ; up a little. Also added extra information regarding ; adjusted quantities. Added ptmsCreated from the ; stocktake header. ; 30-May-2006 JW SR14680: Show reserved/order nums ; 19-May-2006 JW SR14653: Split total into +ve and -ve ; 02-May-2006 JW SR14508: Encapsulated line display from DRUCK. + numbers ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new fltCount,fltDiffQty,tmsCountTimestamp,fltMoveQty,fltActualQuantity new fltTargetQuantity,fltAdjustedDifference, fltCountedQuantity new LFN1,BET,ART,ART1,WG,LAP,ME,AUF,POS,YIZ,ABSCHL new idStocktake, idLine set idStocktake = VORG(1) //SET LFN="" FOR SET LFN=$ORDER(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN)) QUIT:LFN="" DO SR14508 do . ; December 18, 2007, PJones BR014799 . ; we want a snapshot line with the most recent count value . // SR14857 . // December 18, 2007, BR014799 . ; . set strStatus = $$CopyCountsToINWEINV^INWEINVCount(VORG(1)) . set LFN1=$$GetINWEINVwithLatestCount^INWEINVCount(idStocktake,LFN) . QUIT:$$CountEqualsTarget^INWEINVCount(idStocktake,LFN,VORG(15)) ;BR014793 . ; . SET BET=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,2) ;SR14508 - removed '+' . IF VORG(2)'="" QUIT:'$FIND(";"_VORG(2)_";",";"_BET_";") ;NICHT FÜR DIESEN BETRIEB . ; . SET ART=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,1) ;ARTIKEL ;item . SET ART1=$GET(^INART(YM,ART,1)) . ; . set fltTargetQuantity = $$GetTarget^INWEINVCount(idStocktake,LFN) . set fltCountedQuantity = $$GetQty^INWEINVCount(idStocktake,LFN,$$GetHighestCount^INWEINVCount(idStocktake,LFN)) . ; . set fltDiffQty = fltCountedQuantity-fltTargetQuantity . ;SR14508 difference ;BR014793 . set tmsCountTimestamp=$$$INWEINVCountTimestamp(LFN1) . ; . ; FIXME : $$CorrectByHistory doesn't filter the history against the stocktake . ; line properly - being re-written . ; . ;SR17599 set fltMoveQty= fltDiffQty-$$CorrectByHistory^INWEINRUECK(ART,fltDiffQty,ptmsCreated,tmsCountTimestamp,VORG(2),VORG(7),VORG(8)) . set fltMoveQty= fltDiffQty-$$CorrectByHistoryV2^INWEINVUtils(ART,fltDiffQty,ptmsCreated,tmsCountTimestamp,VORG(2),VORG(7),VORG(8)) ;SR17599 . ; . set fltActualQuantity = fltCountedQuantity . set fltAdjustedDifference = fltActualQuantity-fltTargetQuantity-fltMoveQty . ; . ;->AB HIER: EUREC SPECIAL FÜR INVENTUR VOM 28.02.04 ;to stocktaking . ;IF $PIECE(LFN,Y,4)<$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1) IF $PIECE(ART1,Y,56)=1 DO ;AUFNAHME JE SERIENNUMMER . ;.NEW VOR,NACH . ;.SET VOR=$ORDER(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN)) ;ZÄHLSATZ DAVOR . ;.SET NACH=$ORDER(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),LFN),-1) ;ZÄHLSATZ DANACH . ;.IF $PIECE($GET(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),VOR,1)),Y,1)'=ART IF $PIECE($GET(^INWEINV(YM,VORG(1),NACH,1)),Y,1)'=ART QUIT . ;.SET $$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1)=1 . ;.QUIT . ;QUIT:+$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)=+$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1) ;BESTAND GLEICH . ;->BIS HIER ;here is . ; . SET WG=$PIECE(ART1,Y,30) ;WARENGRUPPE //SR14508 - removed + . IF $GET(VORG(3))'="" QUIT:WG=""||'$FIND(";"_VORG(3)_";",";"_WG_";") ;FALSCHE WARENGRUPPE . ; . SET ME="" ;MENGENEINHEIT . IF $PIECE(ART1,Y,40)'="" SET ME=$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE(ART1,Y,40),1)),Y,1) . SET LAP=$PIECE(LFN1,Y,3) ;LAGERPLATZ ;stock location . quit:(VORG(7)'="")&&(VORG(7) ] LAP) ; SR14508: Stock Loc limiter . quit:(VORG(8)'="")&&(LAP ] VORG(8)) . ; . WRITE ! . WRITE YCR . DO NL^WWWTAB . DO NFR^WWWTAB . WRITE $JUSTIFY(LFN,4,0) ;ZÄHLNUMMER . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE BET," / ",LAP ;BETRIEB UND LAGERPLATZ ;location And stock location . IF $PIECE(LFN1,Y,9)="HISTORY" WRITE " "_$$^WWWTEXT(32859) ; History . WRITE " " . DO ZW^WWWTAB . ; . WRITE ART_"
" // SR14857 . //IF WG'="" WRITE "("_WG_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"WARENGRUPPE",SPRACHE,WG,1)),Y,1) // SR14857 . IF WG'="" WRITE "("_WG_") "_$$GetDescription^INDItemGroup(WG) //BR014285 . ; . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . ; . set AUF = $PIECE(LFN1,Y,32) . SET POS = $PIECE(LFN1,Y,33) . ; . if $$$INWEINVStockType(LFN1)="S" do //SR14680 . . WRITE "" . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32047)_": "_AUF ; Order . . IF POS'="" WRITE "-"_POS . . WRITE "
" . ; . if $$$INWEINVStockType(LFN1)="R" do . . WRITE "" . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32480)_": "_AUF ; Reserved . . WRITE "
" . ; . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(ART1,Y,1) . WRITE YINHALT . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(ART1,Y,14) . IF $TRANSLATE(YINHALT,"| ")=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(ART1,Y,1),"| ") SET YINHALT="" . IF YINHALT'="" WRITE "
" . ;LANGER TEXT . FOR YIZ(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1),999)="" DO . . SET YIZ(2)=$TRANSLATE($$^WWWUML($PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1)),1),"|"," ") . . QUIT:$TRANSLATE(YIZ(2)," ")="" . . WRITE $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),1,40) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),41,80)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),41,80) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),81,120)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),81,120) . . IF $EXTRACT(YIZ(2),121,160)'="" WRITE "
",$EXTRACT(YIZ(2),121,160) . . IF $PIECE(YINHALT,"|",YIZ(1)+1,999)'="" WRITE "
",YCR . ; . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . ; . ;WRITE $$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1) . WRITE fltActualQuantity //SR14508 Count Quantity// SR14857 . ;IF $FIND($$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1),0,2) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . ;IF '$FIND($$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1),0,0) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . WRITE fltActualQuantity-fltMoveQty //SR14508 Adjusted Count Quantity// SR14857 . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . ;w $$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1) . WRITE fltTargetQuantity //SR14508 Snapped Quantity . ;IF $FIND($$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),0,2) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . ;IF '$FIND($$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),0,0) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . WRITE fltAdjustedDifference //SR14508 Difference // SR14857 . ;IF $FIND($$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)-$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)-$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),0,2) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . ;IF '$FIND($$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)-$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),".") WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(+$$$INWEINVActualQuantity(LFN1)-$$$INWEINVTargetQuantity(LFN1),0,0) ;BESTANDSDIFFERENZ . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . WRITE ME ;MENGENEINHEIT . WRITE " " . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . DO PREIS^INWEINVDS ;;EINZELPREIS RECHNUNGEN . SET ABSCHL=$JUSTIFY(EK/100*$PIECE(LFN1,Y,21),0,2) ;ABSCHLAG . SET EK=EK-ABSCHL ;NEUER EINZELPREIS . SET EKDIF=EK*(fltAdjustedDifference) ;EINZELPREIS * MENGE ;quantity // SR14857 . WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(EKDIF,0,2,YWHR) . ; . ;SET GESAMT=GESAMT+$JUSTIFY(EKDIF,0,2) //SR14653 . do . . if EKDIF > 0 set fltTotalInc = fltTotalInc + $JUSTIFY(EKDIF,0,2) quit . . set fltTotalDec = fltTotalDec + $JUSTIFY(EKDIF,0,2) . ; . SET MATERIAL=$$$INARTMaterial(ART1) . SET ME1=$$$INARTUnitofMeasure(ART1) . IF MATERIAL'="" IF ME'="" DO . . NEW WERT . . SET WERT=$GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,MATERIAL,ME)) . . SET $PIECE(WERT,Y,1)=$PIECE(WERT,Y,1)+fltAdjustedDifference // SR14857 . . SET $PIECE(WERT,Y,2)=$PIECE(WERT,Y,2)+EKDIF . . SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,MATERIAL,ME)=WERT . ; . if blnPosted do //SR14508: Show posted date . . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . . write $$^WWWDATE($$$INWEINVPosted(LFN1)) . . WRITE " " . ; . DO EF^WWWTAB . DO EL^WWWTAB QUIT GESAMT ;GESAMT ;total ;total whole ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display totals ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 12-May-2006 JW SR14508: Made bold. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do TotalLine(32059,fltTotalInc+fltTotalDec,$$$YES) ;Total Value do TotalLine() do TotalLine("IN00478",fltTotalInc) ;Positive Adj. do TotalLine("IN00479",fltTotalDec) ;Negative Adj. quit TotalLine(pstrTitle="",pfltAmount="",pblnBold=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display total line ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 19-May-2006 JW SR14653: Encapsulated from GESAMT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- WRITE ! WRITE YCR DO NL^WWWTAB DO NFR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZW^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWZ^WWWTAB if pblnBold write "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(pstrTitle) ;GESAMTWERT ;total value ;total value whole if pblnBold write "" WRITE " " DO ZW^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO ZWR^WWWTAB if pfltAmount'="" { if pblnBold write "" WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(pfltAmount,0,2,YWHR) if pblnBold write "" } WRITE " " if blnPosted { //SR14508 DO ZWR^WWWTAB WRITE " " } ;ENDE ;termination DO EF^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB QUIT UPUEB ;ÜBERSCHRIFT ;superscription WRITE "
" DO START00^WWWTAB DO NL^WWWTAB DO NHWO^WWWTAB WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE YKOPF do Title^INWEINVD(VORG(1)) //SR14508 WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" DO EH^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB DO STOP^WWWTAB WRITE "
" WRITE "
" DO START100^WWWTAB ;STARTEN DER ÜBERSCHRIFT ;launching the superscription WRITE "" DO NL^WWWTAB FOR I=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(UES(1),Y,I,99)="" DO NHW^WWWTAB WRITE $PIECE(UES(1),Y,I)," " DO EH^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB WRITE "" QUIT
" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32866) ; "Material" write "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32030) ; "Unit of Measure" write "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32840) ; "Change Quantity" write "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32250)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32009) ; "Total Commission Sum" WRITE "
" . . WRITE MAT1 . . ; . . WRITE "" . . WRITE ME . . ; . . WRITE "" . . write $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE($GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,MAT,ME)),Y,1),0,2) . . ; . . WRITE "" . . write $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE($GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,MAT,ME)),Y,2),0,2) . . ; . . WRITE "
